Appropriate.definition: to set apart for or assign to a particular recipient
Appropriate.origin: [Late Latin appropriare to take possession of, from ad to, for + proprius one's own]

-atÂ·ing.definition: [Late Latinto take possession of, fromto, for +one's own]

1.definition: to set apart for or assign to a particular recipient, purpose, or use [the legislaturefunds for the program]

2.definition: to take or make use of without authority or right
